  • Constructor Details

    • LatLonParser

      public LatLonParser()
      LatLonParser

      constructor for class that parses a lat lon string and normalizes the result. There are two different output forms depending on the value of the sign:

      Normalized output string form when sign is either N/S/E/W: DD: "Cs,Cs" or DMS: "C C Cs, C C Cs" where s = sign (N,S,E,W) C = coordinate

      Normalized output string form when sign is either '+'/' '/'-' DD: "sC,sC or DMS: "sC C C, sC C C" where s = sign (+,-) C = coordinate

  • Method Details

    • parseEtrexString

      public String parseEtrexString(String latLonString)
      parseEtrexString

      Utility method to parse a specialized Garmin Etrex lat lon coordinate string from the input string and return a normalized result.

      This format is described in the M3 data files as DD-MM.MMMH,DDD-MM.MMMH It appears to be a unique format made up the author of the data files.

      Since this format is unique and conflicts with the other types of lat lon formats it was processed using this specialized parsing method.

      The result returned will be a lat lon coordinate separated by a comma and decorated with the sign.

      Parameters:
      latLonString - string to be parsed
      Returns:
      String containing lat/lon coordinate separated by a comma
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if invalid lat/lon string received

    • parseString

      public String parseString(String latLonString)
      parseString

      Utility method to parse lat lon coordinates from the input string and return a normalized result. Can handle DD format and DMS format. The result returned will be a lat lon coordinate separated by a comma and decorated with the sign.

      Parameters:
      latLonString - string to be parsed
      Returns:
      String containing lat/lon coordinate separated by a comma
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if invalid lat/lon string received
